name: Revolve (itch) (Ethan)
description:
CONTROLS: 

WASD - Move

Space - Swap places with mace

Left Click - Reel in your mace

GAMEPLAY:

Swing your mace around to kill enemies and collect targets to increase your multiplier. Reach a multiplier of 10 or higher for an extra life.

This game was made in 48 hours for the 2019 Pizza Game Jam. The theme was a winning horse from the Irish Triple Crown Race. I chose Spinning World, the winner of the Irish Triple Crown Race in 1996. Our team consisted of JakeyBoy as the musician and me, Ethan, as the programmer.

Checkout more of JakeyBoys music at his youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCNaj4-OzPvgUnZydYChdUZg
